name: JMC's Hot New Game
description: JMC's Hot New Game: a new video game by JoedonMcCrackis. Enter the mysterious, ancient land: 'THE PLACE' as you control 'Joedon', the protagonist of this adventure. Make tough choices along the way that may or may not impact the story to come. Don't jump in unprepared, though! For this journey is no cake of piece.
